      • getInspectionPlansAndTask

        @RequestMapping(value="inspection-plans/count",
                method=GET)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getInspectionPlansAndTask​()
        获取年度计划数、本月计划、本月已完成巡检任务数、本月待巡检任务数、计划信息列表
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"yearPlanCount":0,"monthPlanCount":0,"finishTaskCount":0,"unfinishTaskCount":0,"yearTaskCount":0,"finYearTaskCount":0,"listPlan":[{"id":1,"name":"巡检计划"}]}}
